column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is a really fun place for brunch just because there are so many tapas options that you can go with! At the same time
column2: the menu can be quite overwhelming
column3: again because of the number of options. My favorites were the citrus french toast
column6: and the spinach and artichoke crepe. We got a ton of other tapas which were also fantastic but these were probably the ones I would definitely order again. A few of us also split a pitcher of the pear sangria which was a sweet sangria but it didn't really taste very much like pear unfortunately.
